text: Ruth Berhe (born July 2, 1995),http://www.cbc.ca/news/Canada/edmonton/edmonton-singer-ruth-b-launches- career-in-an-instant-1.3345280 known by her stage name Ruth B., is a Canadian singer-songwriter. She was born and raised in Edmonton, Alberta by Ethiopians. Berhe started her music career by singing songs on the platform Vine in 2013. She released her first EP The Intro in November 2015. Then she released her first album Safe Haven in May 2017.
